name: Wet-Dry Vacuum, 3-in-1 Portable Shop Vacuum Cleaner with 2 Peak HP Power Suction, Lightweight Wet Dry Vacuum with Blower & Wall Mount Design for Car, Pet Hair, Hard Floor (High)
short_description: 【3 in 1 Wet-Dry Vacuum】This vacuum cleaner can perform fast wet or dry pickup work. With this multifunctional vacuum cleaner, you can blow away damp liquid spills and dry debris, dust, saws, dirt, or leaves (using a hair dryer port). Simply organize the hoses and power cords on the top handle and side packaging after use to store them.

【Portable & Lightweight】The lightweight features of this wet and dry dual purpose vacuum cleaner are specifically designed for various purposes. The weight of a vacuum cleaner is very light and can be easily used in various environments, such as any cleaning work on vehicles, construction sites, workshops, garages, basements, trucks, houses, etc.

【Powerful Vacuum Cleaner】The vacuum cleaner adopts a 4-peak HP motor, which provides strong suction power and can easily meet various daily usage needs. The dual function of dry and wet can also be easily converted.

【 Further cleaning 】 With a cleaning range of over 16 feet (6 feet of hose, 10 feet of power cord, and 3 extension rods), further cleaning can be easily carried out without removing the device. It also has four rotating casters for easy operation

name: Shop-Vac 5890489 4 Gallon 4.0 Peak HP Wet/Dry Vacuum, 1.25 Inch Diameter x 4 Foot Hose, 6 Foot Cord, Ideal for Jobsite, Garage & Workshop
short_description: Portable & Easy to Store: Shop-vac vacuum cleaners have handles on top for easy lifting. Wall-mounted design, hanging on the wall for convenient and unclutter storage.
Powerful Performance: 4.0 Peak HP and 4.0-gallon Vacuum is ideal for projects in your home, garage, workshop and vehicle.

3 IN 1 Multi-Function: Peak 4.0 HP, strong dry/wet suction and blowing function. It's used to clean dust, wood chips, debris or damp sewage. This vacuum can also be used as a powerful blower, easily converted to a powerful 50cfm air blower, which you can use to blow leaves or clean the patio.
Included Accessories: 4’x 1-1/4" Hose, (1) Gulper Nozzle,(1) Crevice Tool, (1) Filter Bag, (1) Foam Sleeve, (3) Reusable Filter Paper, (1) Wall Mounted Tool Holder and (1)Wall Mounting Bracket

Tough & Dependable: Shop Vac Corporation is the recognized world leader in wet/dry vacuum cleaners. Since 1965, we have made innovative, high quality vacuum cleaners, filters, bags, & other accessories.

name: CRAFTSMAN CMXEVBE17595 16 Gallon 6.5 Peak HP Wet Dry Vac, Heavy-Duty Shop Vacuum Wet and Dry with Filter, Dust Bag, Hose and Attachments for Home Projects & Renovations
short_description: HEAVY-DUTY: Powerful 6.5 Peak HP provides extra power for large projects in the garage, shop and on the jobsite
BUILT-IN BLOWER PORT: Rear blowing port on this wet dry vac allows for quick cleaning of leaves and grass clippings in your garage and outdoors
OVERSIZED DRAIN: Built-in oversized drain on the wet/dry vac allows for convenient emptying of liquids
DUAL-FLEX TECHNOLOGY: 2-1/2 in. diameter shop vacuum hose features Dual-Flex technology for 180-degree mobility at each end to resist kinking
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: 2-1/2 in. x 7 ft. POS-I-LOCK Dual-Flex Hose, 2 Extension Wands, Utility Nozzle, Car Nozzle, Wet Nozzle, Qwik Lock Filter and Dust Collection Bag
COMPATIBLE FILTERS: CMXZVBE38751, CMXZVBE38753, CMXZVBE38754, CMXZVBE38773, CMXZVBE38755, CMXZVBE38776, CMXZVBE38777, CMXZVBE38778, and CMXZVBE38779 Genuine CRAFTSMAN Vac Filters
COMPATIBLE DUST BAGS: CMXZVBE38749 and CMXZVBE38750 Genuine CRAFTSMAN Dust Bags
VAC WARRANTY: 3 Year Limited Warranty
product_description: The CRAFTSMAN 16 Gallon Wet/Dry Vac, featuring our most powerful 6.5 Peak HP motor, is the ideal solution for tackling large cleanup projects in the garage or on the jobsite that need the most power. Large scale renovations, builds, or floods are an easy task for this large shop vacuum. This wet dry vac includes a car nozzle, utility nozzle and wet nozzle. Also included is a large 2-1/2 in. diameter hose with added Dual-Flex that resists kinks and crushing. On-board hose storage plus accessory and power cord organizers help eliminate unneeded hassle and reduce overall storage space. The Qwik Lock Filter Fastening System allows for quick and easy wet dry vacuum filter changes. Equipped with an extra-large drain, the tank empties liquids quickly and easily. The blowing port directs high speed exhaust air through the hose giving you the ability to go from cleaning up from a renovation to blasting yard waste from the deck. *Gallons indicated reflect drum volume, not necessarily collection capacity, actual capacity dependent upon type of debris collected, condition of filter and other factors. Peak horsepower represents a level at or below the maximum horsepower output of an electric motor tested in a laboratory using a dynamometer.

name: Stanley - SL18116P Wet/Dry Vacuum, 6 Gallon, 4 Horsepower Black
short_description: ❤【LARGER CAPACITY】Stanley SL18116P Wet / Dry Vacuum has a larger capacity over 22 L, makes small clean-up jobs a breeze for you as you don’t have to empty the bucket frequently any more.Runtime: 300.0 hours
❤【VERSATILE & POWERFUL】Thanks to the 4 peak HP motor, this vac offers powerful enough suction needed to almost any cleanup jobs in vehicle, jobsite, workshop, garage, basement, van, house, etc

❤【3 in 1 FUNCTION】With this versatile vac you can vacuum both wet liquid spills and dry debris, dust, saw, dirt or blow leaves away(use blower port), just organize the hose and power cord on top handle and side wraps after using, conveniently

❤【FARTHER CLEANUP】With over 16 ft of cleaning reach(6 ft hose, 10 ft power cord and 3 pieces of extension wands) it’s easy to do a farther cleanup for you without unplugging the unit, while it has four swivel casters for convenient and easy manoeuvrability

❤【WHAT YOU GET】Stanley SL18116P Wet / Dry Vac x 1, 1-1/4"x6’ super flexible hose x 1,extension wands x 3, gulper nozzle, floor nozzle x 1,crevice nozzle x 1,foam filter x 1, dust bag x 1, reusable dry filter x 1, 12-Month Warranty
product_description: Stanley's SL18116P Wet/Dry Vacuum, 6-Gallon, 4. 0-Peak HP Wet/Dry Vacuum, with a powerful heavy duty motor for industry leading performance, provides maximum suction power for heavy duty pickup. The powerful rear blower port instantly converts vacuum to power blower. Swiveling casters provide ease of movement in any direction. Other features include a strong handle for easy carrying, a large on/off switch with waterproof design for safe and quick access, a convenient, built-in 10-foot built-in power cord and wrap, an accessories holder to get all tools organized. 14-kPa. Airflow 85 CFM. Accessories include a 1-1/4-inch wide by 6-foot long hose, two extension wands, crevice nozzle, 10-inch floor nozzle, cartridge filter and dust bag. Shipped without wheels installed to reduce the size of the carton.

name: Shop-Vac 2021005 1 Gallon Micro Wet/Dry Vacuum, 1.0 Peak HP, 1.25 Inch Diameter x 4 Foot Hose, 6 Food Cord, Lightweight And Portable, Quick Wet/Dry Pickup
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: This 1 gallon wet dry vacuum is lightweight and extremely portable, and it is designed for all purpose work, with a 1.0 peak HP motor under its hood.
WET OR DRY PICKUPS: This wet vac is great for quick wet or dry pick up jobs in your home, garage, workshop or vehicle. It is easy-to-store and can be stored on the wall.
INCLUDES ACESSORIES: This Shop-Vac Wet Dry Vacuum includes a long power cord, a long suction hose, a gulper nozzle and crevice tool, and onboard cord storage.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: 1.0 peak horsepower, 50 CFM airflow, 45 inches of water in sealed pressure, 120V-60Hz 6.0 Amps, 6 ft power cord, 1 gallon capacity tank and a 1.25 in diameter x 4 ft hose.
GOT DIRT? Shop-Vac's full line of products includes cordless, rechargeable wet dry vacuums, automotive vacuum systems, air movers, attachments & more. Whatever the job, Shop-Vac has you covered!
product_description: Are you getting tired of all the brushing, blowing, dusting and sweeping at the end of your jobs and projects? This 1-Gallon Micro Wet Dry Vacuum by Shop-Vac is lightweight and extremely portable. It is great for quick wet or dry pick up jobs in your home, garage, workshop or vehicle. Shop-Vac has loaded this wet dry vacuum with features and accessories so that you can get your messes cleaned up much faster than the old broom and dustpan ways. The 1 gallon Shop-Vac Wet Dry Vac is an essential tool to have because it comes fully loaded with preferred features, accessories and filters. It is equipped with a 1.0 peak horsepower motor, a 6-foot power cord with onboard cord storage and carry handle. This portable vacuum allows you to clean up your work waste and debris at the end of each project or workday. Other accessories that can also be purchased for use with this Shop-Vac include multi-purpose nozzles, concentrator nozzles, blower nozzles, gulper nozzles, crevice tool attachments and many more. Be sure to include additional disposable filter bags and cartridges for wet and dry pick up with your order, and take full advantage of all the features this Shop-Vac has to offer. Order yours today!

name: Vacmaster 5-Gallon* 3 Peak HP Wet/Dry Vacuum – VOC507PF 0101
short_description: MADE FOR: Everyday wet and dry pick-up
POWERFUL AIRFLOW: 65 CFM easily sucks up more debris
EXTENDED CLEANING REACH: 16-feet of cleaning reach with hose and power cord
FEATURES: 8 accessories, including a cartridge filter for dry pick-up and a foam wet filter for wet pick-up
COMPLETE VAC ORGANIZATION: On-board hose, cord and accessory storage
EASY TRANSPORT: Balanced top handle and durable wide stance casters for portability
VERSATILE DESIGN: Easily converts from wet/dry vac to blower
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Features a large dust-sealed on/off switch

name: Bissell 2035M MultiClean Wet/Dry Garage and Auto Vacuum Cleaner, Red
short_description: Powerful 11 amp motor for excellent wet and dry cleaning
6 gallon capacity to get the job done whether big or small
Includes a blowing function, for clearing dirt and debris from porches, garages and doorways or even to blow up inflatable mattresses and toys with the included tools
2 stage filtration designed to help extend the Life of the filter and provide easier cleaning
Specialized auto tool kit includes crevice tool, precision blowing/suction tool, precision wet suction tool, upholstery brush and detailing/inflatable nozzle tools. Dirt Cup Capacity:23 L
product_description: The Bissell multi clean auto wet + dry auto vac is the perfect multi-function vacuum for those wanting professional results in and out of the home. With 6 gallons of capacity, messes no matter how large or small can be cleaned with ease. Plus a full range of specialized auto tools designed to make cleaning everything from garages, cars and outdoor areas a breeze! combine the high power 11 amp motor with the combination floor tool for excellent cleaning on hard floors, area rugs and low pile carpeting. The wet floor tool is designed for cleaning up wet messes, large or small. For above floor cleaning, a dusting brush and crevice tool are conveniently stored onboard for easy access. The blower function allows for easy removal of leaves and other larger debris from outdoor spaces.

name: BOSCH GAS18V-3N 18 V 2.6-Gallon Wet/Dry Vacuum Cleaner with HEPA Filter (Bare Tool)
short_description: CORDLESS WET/DRY VACUUM DESIGN: Provides sustained suction, prolonged runtime and hepa filter in a light 18-volt tool
ROTATIONAL AIRFLOW TECHNOLOGY: Forces debris against walls of canister, helping to reduce clogging
OUTSTANDING RUNTIME: Operates efficiently to deliver up to four minutes per battery amp hour (ah)
POWERFUL CORDLESS MOTOR: Delivers up to 51 cfm (cubic feet per minute) of airflow
WASHABLE HEPA FILTER: Captures 99.97% of particles at 0.3 microns and larger
COMPACT DESIGN: Vacuum weighs only 10.2 lbs. (tool with attachments only, not including battery included)
FULL ATTACHMENT KIT INCLUDED: Includes three extension tubes, a crevice nozzle and a floor nozzle
ON-BOARD STORAGE OF ATTACHMENTS: Carries the hose and all extension tubes and nozzles on unit
SEMI-TRANSPARENT CONTAINER: Provides easy visual check of container fill level
Bosch 18V cordless power tools are covered by a five year limited warranty. For more information, visit manufacturer’s website
product_description: The Bosch GAS18V-3N 18V Cordless Wet/Dry Vacuum Cleaner is a convenient solution for cleanup just about anywhere, including shop, jobsite and truck. Working with the Bosch 18V power system, this cordless vac is built to complete cleanup or emptying chores. It provides sustained performance with long runtime and delivers up to 30 minutes of runtime using a CORE18V 8 Ah Performance Battery (sold separately). This wet/dry vacuum features rotational airflow technology, produced by a special vacuum canister structure, for sustained suction. It forces debris against walls of canister, helping to reduce clogging, and it delivers up to 51 CFM of airflow. Portable, handy and powerful, this vac has a large 2.6 gallon tank but weighs only 10.2 Lbs. (tool with attachments only, not including battery). It features a large, washable HEPA filter, which captures 99.97% of particles at 0.3 microns and larger. The vac also features a complete set of attachments, including three extension tubes plus a standard nozzle, a crevice nozzle, a floor nozzle, a bend/elbow nozzle and a carrying strap. When used with the optional Bosch vacuum hose adapter (sold separately), this vac can be connected with many Bosch power tools and attachments that have dust-collection ports.

name: Shop-Vac 5922805 Wet/Dry Vacuum, 8 Gallon, 4.5 Peak HP, 1.25 Inch Diameter x 7 Foot Hose, 6 Foot Cord, Ideal for Jobsite, Garage, Workshop & Home
short_description: Powerful Performance: 4.5 Peak HP motor and 8-gallon tank is ideal for projects in your garage, workshop and vehicle.
3-in-1 Multi-Function:: Peak 4.5 HP for strong wet/dry suction and 95 CFM blower. Cleans dust, debris, wood chips, sewage, or blows leaves and patio mess with ease.
Portable: Shop-vac vacuum cleaner has a caster system, which makes vac mobile and easy to move. Top and side carry handle for easy transportation.
